articles.content: They found no increased risk for stroke or heart failure associated with cumulative LDL exposure. The researchers suggest that many factors can contribute to heart failure, and their study had too fe… [+1277 chars]

articles.title: New York City Hit by Spike of a Rare Disease Spread by Rat Urine - Gizmodo
